channel.title: Pop!_OS on Welcome | Mariel's GitHub page
channel.description: Recent content in Pop!_OS on Welcome | Mariel's GitHub page

item.title: Hello from Pop!_OS
item.description: On Christmas Eve I decided try a new chicken recipe and Pop!_OS 22.04, an Ubuntu-based Linux distribution. The chicken was tasty and juicy that day and got even better the next day. However, Pop!_OS turned out even better than the dinner. Here are my thoughts and impressions of this distribution.
